content: *a bright and bold fun striped dog coat your little buddy will be the talk of the dog park yarnspirations * **sizes ** size / dog chest measurement small / 10 25 5 cm medium / 16 40 5 cm large / 24 61 cm xl / 30 76 cm **yarn requirements ** bernat® super value 5 oz/140 g main color mc 1 ball contrast a b c d e 1 ball each 6 colors 6 balls total sizes 4 mm us f and 4 5 mm us g crochet hook the pattern is designed for any worsted weight yarn
